name: Pongmates
description:
Meet Pongmates. A brand new classic Ping Pong game with a unique gameplay. Play with two people on one screen. 3 unique characters: Nimbler, Keeper, and Winger. Choose your favourite character and challenge your friends! It's fun.

Features:
— 2 players sharing one screen
— Unique characters
— Realistic physics gameplay
— No in-app ads

Give it a try now!
